name: Shockball PROTOTYPE
description:
This is a prototype for a game idea that I had. I quickly scrapped together a prototype to see if the game would be fun to play and if my ideas worked well in the actual gameplay. Unfortunately, I found that my idea for a physics based puzzle platformer would not work well together so I  will not be continuing this project. If anyone wants to play it there is a web build and Windows .exe file.

Classic example as to why you prototype before you commit to your game idea.
